span.span: A value that represents the width of the rectangle in pixels.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此结构表示 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 结构的 .NET 投影 `Rect` 。This struct represents the .NET projection of the Windows Runtime (WinRT) `Rect` struct. 有关详细信息，请参阅 UWP API 参考中的 [Rect](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.foundation.rect) 。For more information, see [Rect](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.foundation.rect) in the UWP API reference. 有关此成员的详细信息和示例，请参阅 .NET FRAMEWORK API 参考中的。For more information and examples of this member, see in the .NET Framework API reference. (示例演示 WPF 用法，可能无法直接转换为 UWP XAML。 ) (Examples show WPF usage and might not translate directly to UWP XAML.)

span.span: Specified a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double X { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.X : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置矩形左边的 x 轴值。

span.span: Gets or sets the x-axis value of the left side of the rectangle.

value.span: 矩形左边的 x 轴值。

span.span: The x-axis value of the left side of the rectangle.

value.span: 此值被解释为坐标空间中的像素。

span.span: This value is interpreted as pixels within the coordinate space.

summary.span: 获取或设置矩形顶边的 y 轴值。

span.span: Gets or sets the y-axis value of the top side of the rectangle.

value.span: 矩形顶边的 y 轴值。

span.span: The y-axis value of the top side of the rectangle.

value.span: 此值被解释为坐标空间中的像素。

span.span: This value is interpreted as pixels within the coordinate space..
